author: franzoni
body:
- relval run2 HLT points to 25/50ns evolving menus (while we 7_4 points to the frozen menu to be used for DR production)
- in current 7_5_X, no detectable change since relvalXX and forzenXX point to the same menu
- @fwyzard : Andrea, please confirm
                   (this is a follow up to the logic of today's chat; the implementation is in reverse: the 7_4 matrix i already pointing to the frozenXX)
title: relval run2 HLT points to 25/50ns evolving menues
